title: Don't leave your league open when you go to work!!
body: Left my league open when I went to work the other day and my little brother tried to play some games. His 6 years old so you can guess how that went. Now I've got 20mins waits to jump in game and to be honest about to quit League. 20 mins is way to long to wait for anything.

replies.body:
Is your brother some kind of league prodigy? I see no feed games in your history, so even if he got bored and afk'd he must have been doing some mad work for his team XD

I recently taught my little sister (8) and little brother (5) how to play, and I can't even put them up against bots in the custom games because they die so much.

haha so he afk'd a few times i take it ?
sounds painful
